desc: Visit Robust American Patches to audition and purchase the finest custom synth patches and presets available. We create original patches from scratch for the Dave Smith and Tom Oberheim OB-6, Sequential Prophet Rev 2, Korg Prologue, and the Moog Sub 37.

layout.text: Greetings fellow "synthusiasts" and welcome to Robust American Patches! We take absolute pride in offering the finest custom patches for some of today's most outstanding synthesizers.
Complete video demonstrations are available on the individual product pages. Choose your synth's manufacturer to see and hear our patches:
TOM OBERHEIM IS BACK IN THE SADDLE - OB-X8 IS REVEALED!!
AVAILABLE NOW - VOLUME III FOR THE MOOG SUB 37 !!!
